keyword: how many calories are in a tablespoon of peanut butter
title: How Many Calories in a Tablespoon of Peanut Butter?
meta_description: Discover how many calories are in a tablespoon of peanut butter, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, and simple tweaks for variations.
h1: How Many Calories in a Tablespoon of Peanut Butter?
assumptions: Standard creamy peanut butter, unsalted, no added sugars; ~16 g per tablespoon.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, type (creamy/chunky), ingredients, and processing; check labels for accuracy.

quick_answer.text: One tablespoon of peanut butter contains about 94 calories and 4 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories are in a tablespoon of peanut butter?
faqs.a: Approximately 94 calories for one standard tablespoon.

faqs.q: Is peanut butter high in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, about 8.1 g total fat per tablespoon, mostly healthy unsaturated fats.

faqs.q: How much protein in a tablespoon of peanut butter?
faqs.a: Around 4 g of protein per tablespoon.
About 3.1 g carbs, including 1.1 g fiber and 1.3 g sugars per tablespoon.

faqs.q: What affects calories in peanut butter?
faqs.a: Brand, added sugars/oils, and type (creamy vs. chunky) can vary calories by 10-20%.
